item.description:
Let's go to the boat show!
I just found out- that if you take a test drive in GM SUV you can get free admission to the Boat show. Took maybe 20 minutes and was fun.
Looking forward to seeing you!

I want to especially welcome new members so we can get introduced to each other...


We can tour together or while we are there, we will pick a place to gather on the hour and compare notes. We'll make sure we all have each other's mobile numbers. You can meet met at the SleepAfloat both #157

Click here for the exhibitor list

http://www.newenglandboatshow.com/attendees/exhibitors/exhibitors.aspx#anchorS


This may also be an opportunity to discover many more WaterSki Enthusiasts who will be at the boat show.

Past years we met and spent some quality time with WaterSki Champion Rhoni Barton Bischoff at MacCallum's Boathouse booth (sponsoring Nautique).  What will we find this year?


The top 3 WaterSki and Wakeboard boat brands I expect to see are Correct Craft, Malibu  and Nautique.

So let's get together and have some fun with a focus on the
warm weather that is really just around the corner.

 

New England Boat Show
at Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, 415 Summer St., Boston, MA, 02206

Dates & Location

February 16 – February 24, 2013

Boston Convention & Exhibition Center
415 Summer St.
Boston, MA 02210

Show Hours

Saturdays 10am–8pm
Sunday, February 17 11am–6pm
Monday, February 18 10am-7pm

Tuesday - Friday 1pm–9pm 
Sunday February 24 11am–5:30pm

Admission

Adults $15.00 
Children Age 15 years and under Free (when accompanied by an Adult).

Please note: Credit and debit cards will be accepted for ticket purchases at the show. A Citizen’s Bank ATM is available in the show lobby for your cash needs.

For your convenience and to avoid the lines, you may also purchase your tickets on line!

 

Parking Information

BCEC South Parking Lot:

To access from Summer Street, turn onto Eastside Drive, drive past the valet area, and continue straight along the side of the building. At the end of the building, make a right and go down the ramp. At the bottom of the ramp, turn left and you will see the entrance to the South Parking lot in front of you.


About this Meetup Group


Looking forward to seeing you soon.

Peter D
item.name: Let's go to the boat show - Opening Day (Show's First Saturday)
